body.name: domyfan 14" Laptop Monitor Extender, FHD 1080P IPS Dual Laptop Screen Extender, HDMI/USB-A/Type-C Plug and Play for Windows, Mac, Chrome, Android, Xbox, Switch, PS5, Work with 13.3”-17” Laptops
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 4 hrs 5 mins
features: 📟Excellent Display Parameters-- 14-inch HD display, 1000:1 contrast, IPS 1080P resolution, rich colors, better viewing experience, The laptop monitor extender can independently adjust the brightness, Stereo speaker, contrast and other parameters. Flexibly adjust the screen rotation Angle 180 degrees, adjust the best viewing Angle at any time, whenever and wherever you can greatly enjoy the visual and audio dual experience.

💻Increase Your Productivity by 200%-- The laptop screen extender supports three modes: Extended Mode, Duplicated Mode, and Second Screen Mode, Perfect for conference presentations, multitasking, The perfect multi-screen simultaneous and multi-screen standalone display solution for laptop users, perfect for gamer, programmers, financial and investment professionals, designers, and anyone who needs a more efficient workflow.

🎯Wide Range of Applications-- The bracket for monitor extension for laptop is easy to use, clamp the bracket on the top of the computer screen, easy to install and fixed without falling. Suitable for 13.3"-17" laptops. The weighs an ultra-light 2.33lbs, Complimentary handbag easy to carry, fold or unfold, this travel monitor for laptop is a great choice for office meetings, home work and business travel, entertainment games.

⚡Plug and Play Without Driver-- Only 1 cable are needed for plug and play function. Make sure your laptop has a full-featured C port or an HDMI port and a USB-A port. If the screen displays "No Signal" after connecting the USB-C cable, it means that your laptop's C port only supports power supply, then you need to connect the HDMI cable to the display extension to provide it with video signals.

🎁High Compatibility-- Compatible with Mac, PC, Windows, Android, PS5, Xbox, Switch and most other operating systems, if your connection fails, please contact us directly, our after-sales team will give you a satisfactory solution. Package includes :1* Portable monitor, 1* User Manuel, 1*Carry Bag, 1* USB-C to USB-C cable, 1* HDMI to TYPE-C cable, 1*USB-A to USB-C cable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing Portable Monitor!
reviews.reviewText: After searching for a portable monitor for months, I decided on this one after watching the video demonstration of the product. I have a 17” HP laptop and this portable monitor snaps on seamlessly to my laptop. It is very secure and does not slide off during use. The screen also rotates inwards and outwards. The clarity of the screen is actually clearer than my laptop screen (sub par work issued laptop). You can also adjust the brightness and can receive sound as well. Set up took only 5 minutes, quick plug and play. The product comes with three types of wires that you can choose from based on the ports you have on your current device. There is no need to purchase anything in addition to the product as everything you need is included. The bonus is the very cute travel bag that it comes with, I have been using it for a few weeks now and have had no issues. Solid product with a great price point.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great portable monitor
reviews.reviewText: This really is a great portable monitor for a laptop.It easily and securely attaches to the back of the laptop and has a fold out leg that stabilizes it on a desk/table.The picture quality is great. Also, it comes with a nice carrying case.Overall, it is easy to set up and a high-quality product. I definitely recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceptional Convenience and Quality - Domyfan 14"
reviews.reviewText: Exceptional Convenience and Quality - Domyfan 14" Portable MonitorRating: ★★★★★I recently purchased the Domyfan 14" Portable Monitor for my laptop, and it has been an absolute game-changer for my work and entertainment needs. Here's my take on this impressive device:Setting up the Domyfan monitor was a breeze. Right out of the box, it was almost plug-and-play. The included instructions were clear and concise, making the initial setup hassle-free. Connecting it to my laptop via the USB-C cable was straightforward, and it was up and running in no time.The user experience has been seamless. The touch functionality is responsive and intuitive, which enhances my productivity, especially when multitasking. The on-screen display settings are easy to navigate, allowing me to adjust brightness, contrast, and other features effortlessly.The build quality of the monitor is top-notch. It's sleek, lightweight, and feels durable enough for regular use. The display quality is remarkable – colors are vibrant, and the image is crisp, making it perfect for both work presentations and watching movies. The 1080p resolution is a significant upgrade from other portable monitors I've used.What I genuinely appreciate about the Domyfan monitor is its versatility. It's perfect for on-the-go professionals or students who need an extra screen. The included cover that doubles as a stand is a thoughtful addition, providing protection and functionality.If you're in the market for a portable monitor, the Domyfan 14" is a fantastic choice. It's ideal for anyone who values portability, ease of use, and quality. Whether you're a digital nomad, a business professional, or just someone who enjoys a dual-screen setup, this monitor won't disappoint.The Domyfan 14" Portable Monitor has exceeded my expectations in every aspect. Its combination of ease of setup, user-friendly interface, and exceptional display quality makes it a must-have accessory for laptop users. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I needed
reviews.reviewText: I needed a replacement for my travel monitor since my kiddos are constantly fighting over my old one. This one was right in my price range and looked very nice. It came with 2 different power adapters so you can use with a USB-C or HDMI connection. It fits in my laptop bag easily and came with a very nice case. It was very easy to attach to my laptop and the display is great! I don't think you could go wrong with this choice !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My first portable monitor. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
reviews.reviewText: I work from home full time. I ordered the portable monitor to use when I travel so I can work with ease. The monitor comes with a carrying bag and 3 cords that you can choose from to connect to your laptop depending on what ports you have available. The weight of the product is good. Not too heavy but also not light where you question the quality. The image quality is great. The value for money is very good. It isn’t overpriced like the other options out there. It is stable when you attach it to your laptop and there is no lag in performance. It’s just like having a traditional second monitor. If you are looking for a portable monitor this is the one to buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great to use "standalone" or with laptop
reviews.reviewText: I travel with a Mac Mini and my husband travels with a 14 inch MacBook Pro. This monitor suits both our needs. It is definitely plug-and-play, and the screen looks nice. Even with the extra folding piece it is slim enough to fit in the laptop sleeve of a book bag. It fit snuggly onto a laptop as a second monitor, but the kickstand also allows it to be used as a single monitor (with a bit of privacy to boot). My only selfish wish is that the laptop mounting side was detachable and the kickstand was on the monitor side for versatility of usage. Otherwise, it has been well worth the money so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I attached the screen it came with easy instructions, I connected the HDMI cable and the USB cable into the the laptop. It has good resolution, it comes with a speaker inside the screen, it works well.
